pageContext.claim: “Remember? "You can keep your doctor." Remember that? 28 times, "You can keep it." That didn't happen. It turned out to be alive. Hey, where are the fact checkers? You know, some of the most dishonest people in media are the so-called fact checkers. 28 times, "You can keep your doctor." That didn't turn out to be what he said.”
pageContext.analysis: This is wrong. The Fact Checker was not active when Obama first made the “keep your plan” promise but the Washington Post ran three articles saying he could not keep this promise. Moreover, FactCheck.org, a major fact-checking organization, at the time said Obama "can’t make that promise to everyone." The Fact Checker later awarded Four Pinocchios to Obama's claim.
